full_text:
Loyalty Points
Loyalty Points (often abbreviated as LP) are an in-game currency that is earned when faction standing is gained. They can be used to buy items in faction shops.
Obtaining
Loyalty points are obtained at a 1:1 ratio with Faction Standing. When you complete a mission, You earn standing along with loyalty points. You can also earn loyalty points by turning in items to the field offices. Hauling crates from staging areas to the HQ of a contested system will also earn you loyalty points.
Military Promotions
If you talk to a Foralkan, Kavani, or Lycentian recruiter, You can ask them to promote your rank. In order to be promoted, You must earn a certain amount of Loyalty Points. Once you have enough, You can spend your LP to go to the next rank, unlocking more items in faction shops and receiving a reward.
